summary: The script demonstrates how to load the OGBN-Arxiv citation graph, preprocess it, run a node classification model, and apply the Correct-and-Smooth post‑processing technique to refine the predictions before evaluating the final accuracy.
business_intent: Showcase a practical workflow for improving graph neural network node classification results on a standard benchmark, serving as a reference implementation for researchers and developers working with graph data and post‑processing methods.
